SQLFunctionSpec.Name: USR_UFN_CHILDPROJECT_GETLOOKUPID
SQLFunctionSpec.Description: Returns the constituent lookup ID for a specific child project extension
SQLFunctionSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda
SQLFunctionSpec.CreateFunctionSQL:
create function dbo.USR_UFN_CHILDPROJECT_GETLOOKUPID( @childProjectID uniqueidentifier = null ) returns nvarchar(20) with execute as caller as begin declare @childProjectLookupID nvarchar(20) = ''
select @childProjectLookupID = LOOKUPID from dbo.CONSTITUENT where ID = @childProjectID
return @childProjectLookupID end
